main.name: Geury Roustand
main.description: passionate about programming and learning new technologies
main.bio: Hi there! I am Geury!  I am from the Dominican Republic, I studied tourism business administration, but I always had a passion for programming, and some time ago I learned HTML5 and CSS3, some Javascript, and PHP. Being in Germany I realized how technologies changing the world and the work methodologies, I got the opportunity to participate in a full stack coding Bootcamp at Strive School and I didn't miss it, I quit my job. Now I'm working as a Frontend Developer in Diconium where I work mainly with React.

education.school: Universidad Abierta Para Adultos UAPA - Dominican Republic
education.description: Planning, organization, direction and control of the company's resources (human and technological) to achieve the company's objectives.
MEAN  ( MongoDB,  Express.js , React.js , Node.js) , Redux,   Bootstrap,  CSS3 ,HTML5,  JavaScript, Typescript   PostgreSQL ., GIT, Github , UX/UI  , Cloud & Security.

work.title: Frontend Developer
work.description: Competent in developing web pages with React, ensuring code quality and accessibility through the implementation of unit tests and accessibility testing. Able to deliver user-friendly and inclusive web pages for all users.

work.company: Luxuy Bahia Principe Cayo Levantado- Dominican Republic
work.title: Customer Service Assistant Manager
work.description: Handle and resolve customer complaints. Participate in daily management and meet with all departments. Ensure that all customers enjoy their stay at the hotel

work.title: Receptionist
work.description: Welcoming guests to the hotel in a polite, friendly and helpful manner. Accepting payments from guests in the form of cash or credit cards. Processing and resolving customer complaints.
